channel.title: [639] How do i change hp on jad? [639]
channel.description: [center][b]Hello Moparian or Members on moparscape! :D Good morning, i just added jad on ::jadwolf and i added fire cape as drop! :p And i'm wondering how do i change his hp, he has 2 hp xD Thank's verry much if you would really help me, my preasure..[/b][/center]

item.title: [639] How do i change hp on jad? [639]
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

they are .xml files in NDE/data/npcs
search for the id NpcDefinition2745.xml

If there isn’t one you need to create one yourself

Read full topic
item.source: [639] How do i change hp on jad? [639]

item.source: [639] How do i change hp on jad? [639]

item.title: [639] How do i change hp on jad? [639]
item.dc:creator: @Saletana Saletana
item.description:
@Saletana wrote:

search for npc.cfg, it should be in source->cfg->(all cfg files here), in that cgf file you should find the npc ID 2745 and its hp, change it to what you want, compile, restart server and you’re done.

Read full topic

item.title: [639] How do i change hp on jad? [639]

@bin703 wrote:

Add his definition in the NDE file you will need his stats and bonus’s
